title: No chest, after s
body: So i recently played kayle support and got an s- for it but didnt get a chest, i also checked in my champions tab and kayle suddenly had a golden border around her(she didnt have it before the match), also before i started the match i had 3 golden boxes and 1 grey one in my summoner profile and now i still have 3 golden and 1 grey boxes. How come i didnt get a chest? Plz help.

replies.body: i got an S lots of times but i didnt get a chest too..

I looked into this for you and see that you already earned a chest for Kayle back in April.  Currently, you can only earn one chest per season for a champion that you own.  The golden border around a champion also signifies that a chest was earned for that champion.  More information on this is available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  I hope that helps clear things up!
